sentences: Sebastian Lind (born Sebastian Lind Hansen on 28 August 1988) is a Danish singer-songwriter.
He released his first single "Stop These Feet", on 24 September 2011 and toured with Mads Langer on the first half of his 2009â€“10 tour, as supporting act.
In April 2012 he supported Marit Larsen on her tour in Germany for five concerts.
